citeinfo.origin: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), Biological Resources Division, Alaska Science Center (ASC), National Biological Service
citeinfo.title: Historical NDVI of Sea Study Area 1985-90

descript.abstract: Data Type: Remotely Sensed Data; Historical primary productivity measurements for the terrestrial portion of the sea study area 1985-1990. A data set of AVHRR derived Normalized Difference Vegetation Indices (NDVI) for the SEA study area. This project is still in progress. Our aim is to develop an annual growing season (May-September) time series of NDVI for 1985-1996.

idinfo.accconst: The data layers will be fully available on request following the completion of processing and extensive quality checks.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
